summary: I OWN A 95 MAZDA 626 LX - THE TRANSMISSION HAS BEEN GIVING ME PROBLEMS.  I'M ABOUT TO GET MY TRANSMISSION FIXED FOR THE 2ND TIME SINCE I'VE OWNED IT.  IT HAS 75,000 MILES ON IT.  THE O/D LIGHT FLASHES WHEN I DRIVE AT LEAST 40 STRAIGHT MILES WITHOUT STOPPING.  THIS IS MY 2ND MAZDA.  I HAD A 323 PRIOR AND I HAD TO FIX THE TRANSMISSION ON THAT ALSO.  *NLM
